verses.verse: <S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H2720>dry<s%> <S%H6595>morsel<s%> with <S%H7962>quietness,<s%> than a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H2077>feasting<s%> with <S%H7379>strife.<s%>

A <S%H5650>servant<s%> who deals <S%H7919>wisely<s%> will <S%H4910>rule<s%> over a <S%H1121>son<s%> who causes <S%H954>shame,<s%> and shall have a <S%H2505>part<s%> in the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
The refining <S%H4715>pot<s%> is for <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> for <S%H2091>gold,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H974>tests<s%> the <S%H3826>hearts.<s%>
An <S%H7489>evildoer<s%> <S%H7181>heeds<s%> <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H8193>lips.<s%> A <S%H8267>liar<s%> gives <S%H238>ear<s%> to a <S%H1942>mischievous<s%> <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
Whoever <S%H3932>mocks<s%> the <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker.<s%> He who is <S%H8056>glad<s%> at <S%H343>calamity<s%> shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>
<S%H1121>Children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children<s%> are the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of old <S%H2205>men;<s%> the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of <S%H1121>children<s%> are their <S%H1>parents.<s%>
<S%H3499>Arrogant<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> <S%H5000>isn't<s%> fitting for a <S%H5036>fool,<s%> much less do <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> fit a <S%H5081>prince.<s%>
A <S%H7810>bribe<s%> is a <S%H2580>precious<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of him who <S%H1167>gives<s%> <S%H6437>it;<s%> wherever he turns, he <S%H7919>prospers.<s%>
He who <S%H3680>covers<s%> an <S%H6588>offense<s%> <S%H1245>promotes<s%> <S%H160>love;<s%> but he who <S%H8138>repeats<s%> a <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H6504>separates<s%> best <S%H441>friends.<s%>
A <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> <S%H5181>enters<s%> deeper into <S%H995>one<s%> who has understanding than a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5221>lashes<s%> into a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>
An <S%H7451>evil<s%> man <S%H1245>seeks<s%> only <S%H4805>rebellion;<s%> therefore a <S%H394>cruel<s%> <S%H4397>messenger<s%> shall be sent against <S%H7971>him.<s%>
Let a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H7909>robbed<s%> of her cubs <S%H6298>meet<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> rather <S%H408>than<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> in his <S%H200>folly.<s%>
Whoever <S%H7725>rewards<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H4066>strife<s%> is like <S%H6362>breaching<s%> a <S%H4325>dam,<s%> therefore <S%H5203>stop<s%> <S%H7379>contention<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> quarreling breaks <S%H1566>out.<s%>

He who <S%H6663>justifies<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and he who <S%H7561>condemns<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them alike are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Why is there <S%H4242>money<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> to <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> since he has no <S%H3820>understanding?<s%>
A <S%H7453>friend<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> at all <S%H6256>times;<s%> and a <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> for <S%H6869>adversity.<s%>

A <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%> <S%H8628>strikes<s%> <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H6148>becomes<s%> <S%H6161>collateral<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>
He who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4683>strife.<s%> One who builds a <S%H1361>high<s%> <S%H6607>gate<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>

One who has a <S%H6141>perverse<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H4672>doesn't<s%> find <S%H2896>prosperity,<s%> and one who has a <S%H2015>deceitful<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> into <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>
He who becomes the <S%H3205>father<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H8424>grieves.<s%> The <S%H1>father<s%> of a <S%H5036>fool<s%> has no <S%H8055>joy.<s%>
A <S%H8056>cheerful<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> makes <S%H3190>good<s%> <S%H1456>medicine,<s%> but a <S%H5218>crushed<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3001>dries<s%> up the <S%H1634>bones.<s%>
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man <S%H3947>receives<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> in <S%H2436>secret,<s%> to <S%H5186>pervert<s%> the <S%H734>ways<s%> of <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is before the face of one who has <S%H6440>understanding,<s%> but the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> wander to the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
A <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> brings <S%H3708>grief<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H4470>bitterness<s%> to her who bore <S%H3205>him.<s%>
Also to <S%H6064>punish<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is not <S%H2896>good,<s%> nor to <S%H5221>flog<s%> <S%H5081>officials<s%> for their <S%H3476>integrity.<s%>
He who <S%H2820>spares<s%> his <S%H561>words<s%> <S%H3045>has<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%> He who is <S%H3368>even<s%> <S%H7307>tempered<s%> is a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
Even a <S%H191>fool,<s%> when he keeps <S%H2790>silent,<s%> is <S%H2803>counted<s%> <S%H2450>wise.<s%> When he <S%H331>shuts<s%> his <S%H8193>lips,<s%> he is thought to be <S%H995>discerning.<s%>
